name: A Pirate's Knife For Me
description:
Ahoy there, matey!

Welcome to "A Pirate's Knife for Me," a most swashbuckling game! As a daring pirate, you have one mission: to beat all the levels by accumulating at least or exactly a given amount of points before the timer runs out.

To do so, you'll need to show off your knife-throwing skills by taking aim at the sneaky wooden fish that are moving along the ship's deck. With each toss, you'll earn  or lose points according to the number on every fish you manage to hit, so aim carefully and don't waste any shots.

Do you think you have what it takes to make it to the final level and become the most notorious pirate  on the high seas? Well, just come aboard and find out if you can prove your worth!

Controls

  • A/Left Arrow Key: move left
  • D/Right Arrow Key: move right
  • Space: knife throw
  • Escape (during gameplay): pause / unpause
